value.name: Variant Change
value.description: Describes distinct genomic variant sequence change types. These change type are applied only to coding sequence variants.

value.name: Data
value.description: Data type defines the type of information each node in WAVe gene tree will contain.

value.name: Association
value.description: Association type describes the distinct associations that can be included in WAVe.

value.name: API Method
value.description: Describes WAVe API methods.

value.name: Reference sequence
value.description: Describes gene reference sequences.

value.name: Variation
value.description: Genomic variants.

value.name: LSDB
value.description: Locus specific databases.

value.name: Locus
value.description: Genetic and genomic information.

value.name: Publication
value.description: Scientific publications.

value.name: Disease
value.description: Human diseases.

value.name: Study
value.description: Genetic and genomic studies.

value.name: Pharmacogenomics
value.description: Pharmacogenomics information.

value.name: Genome
value.description: Chromossomal location information.

value.name: Pathway
value.description: Metabolic pathways information.

value.name: Protein
value.description: Proteomic information.

value.name: Ontology
value.description: Gene Ontology information.

value.name: Substitution
value.description: Substitution at DNA level (like c.76A>T)

value.name: Deletion
value.description: Deletion (like c.76delA)

value.name: Duplication
value.description: Duplication (like c.76dupA)

value.name: Insertion
value.description: Insertion (like c.76_77insG)

value.name: Inversion
value.description: Inversion (like c.76_83inv)

value.name: Conversion
value.description: Conversion (like c.123_678conNM_004006.1:c.123_678)

value.name: Deletion/Insertion
value.description: Deletion and Insertion (like c.112_117delinsTG)

value.name: Gene+Leaf
value.description: Association between a gene and a leaf, required to build the gene navigation tree.

value.name: Variant+Leaf
value.description: Association between a variant and a leaf, required to enable direct links from the variant to the respective locus-specific database.

value.name: Gene+Gene
value.description: Association between two distinct genes.
Association between two distinct variants.
Association between two distinct variants.

value.name: LRG
value.description: GEN2PHEN Locus Reference Genomic reference sequence.

value.name: Gene Tree RSS
value.description: Access to WAVe navigation tree in RSS Format.

value.name: Gene Tree Atom
value.description: Access to WAVe navigation tree in Atom Format.

value.name: Gene Tree JSON
value.description: Access to WAVe navigation tree in JSON Format.

value.name: Variants RSS
value.description: Access to WAVe gene variants in RSS Format.

value.name: Variants Atom
value.description: Access to WAVe gene variants in Atom Format.

value.name: Variants JSON
value.description: Access to WAVe gene variants in JSON Format.

value.name: Browse genes Atom
value.description: Access to WAVe gene browsing in JSON Format.

value.name: Browse genes RSS
value.description: Access to WAVe gene browsing in JSON Format.

value.name: Browse genes JSON
value.description: Access to WAVe gene browsing in JSON Format.

value.name: Universal Access
value.description: Access to WAVe Universal Access.

value.name: Leiden Open-source Variation Database
value.description: Reference to Leiden Open-source Variation Database LSDBs.

value.name: Universal Mutation Database
value.description: Reference to Universal Mutation Database LSDBs.

value.name: MUTbase
value.description: Reference to MUTbases (databases for immunodeficiency-causing mutations) LSDBs.

value.name: Unknown LSDBs
value.description: Reference to various general LSDBs.

value.name: Pharmacogenomics KB
value.description: Referebce to information from Pharmacogenomics Knowledge Base.

source.query: SELECT DISTINCT BE.BioEntityName AS result FROM Protein P INNER JOIN ProteinBioEntity PBO ON PBO.ProteinId = P.ProteinId INNER JOIN BioEntity BE ON BE.BioEntityId = PBO.BioEntityId WHERE BE.DataTypeId = 36 AND P.ProteinId IN (SELECT P.ProteinId FROM Protein P INNER JOIN Identifier I on I.ProteinId = P.ProteinId WHERE P.TaxonomicId = 9606 AND I.DataTypeId = 1 AND I.Alias LIKE '#replaceme#')

value.name: All genomic variants
value.description: All available genomic variants presented using the coding sequence as reference.

value.name: Substitution variants
value.description: All available substitution genomic variants presented using the coding sequence as reference.

value.name: Deletion variants
value.description: All available deletion genomic variants presented using the coding sequence as reference.

value.name: Insertion variants
value.description: All available insertion genomic variants presented using the coding sequence as reference.

value.name: Duplication variants
value.description: All available duplication genomic variants presented using the coding sequence as reference.

value.name: Conversion variants
value.description: All available conversion genomic variants presented using the coding sequence as reference.

value.name: Deletion/Insertion variants
value.description: All available deletion/insertion genomic variants presented using the coding sequence as reference.

value.name: Inversion variants
value.description: All available inversion genomic variants presented using the coding sequence as reference.

value.name: QuExTGene
value.description: Publications ranked in QuExT and ordered by gene relevance.

value.name: PubMed
value.description: Publications from Medline

value.name: NCBI OMIM
value.description: Information relative to diseases available Online Mendelian Inheritance in Men database.

source.query: SELECT DISTINCT BE.BioEntityName AS result FROM Protein P INNER JOIN ProteinBioEntity PBO ON PBO.ProteinId = P.ProteinId INNER JOIN BioEntity BE ON BE.BioEntityId = PBO.BioEntityId WHERE BE.DataTypeId = 151 AND P.ProteinId IN (SELECT P.ProteinId FROM Protein P INNER JOIN Identifier I on I.ProteinId = P.ProteinId WHERE P.TaxonomicId = 9606 AND I.DataTypeId = 1 AND I.Alias LIKE '#replaceme#')

value.name: NCBI MapViewer
value.description: Information from NCBI Map Viewer project.

value.name: Ensembl
value.description: Information from Ensembl genome browser.

source.query: SELECT DISTINCT BE.BioEntityName AS result FROM Protein P INNER JOIN ProteinBioEntity PBO ON PBO.ProteinId = P.ProteinId INNER JOIN BioEntity BE ON BE.BioEntityId = PBO.BioEntityId WHERE BE.DataTypeId = 15 AND P.ProteinId IN (SELECT P.ProteinId FROM Protein P INNER JOIN Identifier I on I.ProteinId = P.ProteinId WHERE P.TaxonomicId = 9606 AND I.DataTypeId = 1 AND I.Alias LIKE '#replaceme#')

value.name: Gene Cards
value.description: Information from Gene Cards.

value.name: Gene Names
value.description: Information from HGNC GeneNames.

source.query: SELECT DISTINCT I.Alias AS result FROM Identifier I WHERE I.DataTypeId = 34 AND I.ProteinId IN (SELECT P.ProteinId FROM Protein P INNER JOIN Identifier I ON I.ProteinId = P.ProteinId WHERE P.TaxonomicId = 9606 AND I.DataTypeId = 1 AND I.Alias LIKE '#replaceme#')

value.name: NCBI Entrez Gene
value.description: Information from NCBI Entrez Gene database.

source.query: SELECT DISTINCT I.Alias AS result FROM Identifier I WHERE I.DataTypeId = 9 AND I.ProteinId IN (SELECT P.ProteinId FROM Protein P INNER JOIN Identifier I ON I.ProteinId = P.ProteinId WHERE P.TaxonomicId = 9606 AND I.DataTypeId = 1 AND I.Alias LIKE '#replaceme#')

value.name: KEGG
value.description: Information from metabolic pathways available in Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes database.

source.query: SELECT DISTINCT I.Alias AS result FROM Identifier I WHERE I.DataTypeId = 11 AND I.ProteinId IN (SELECT P.ProteinId FROM Protein P INNER JOIN Identifier I ON I.ProteinId = P.ProteinId WHERE P.TaxonomicId = 9606 AND I.DataTypeId = 1 AND I.Alias LIKE '#replaceme#')

value.name: Reactome
value.description: Information from metabolic pathways availablble in Reactome.

source.query: SELECT DISTINCT BE.BioEntityName AS result FROM Protein P INNER JOIN ProteinBioEntity PBO ON PBO.ProteinId = P.ProteinId INNER JOIN BioEntity BE ON BE.BioEntityId = PBO.BioEntityId WHERE BE.DataTypeId = 40 AND P.ProteinId IN (SELECT P.ProteinId FROM Protein P INNER JOIN Identifier I on I.ProteinId = P.ProteinId WHERE P.TaxonomicId = 9606 AND I.DataTypeId = 1 AND I.Alias LIKE '#replaceme#')

value.name: UniProt/SwissProt
value.description: Information regarding available, active and reviewed proteins in UniProt.

value.name: UniProt/TrEMBL
value.description: Information regarding available, active and unreviewed proteins in UniProt.

value.name: Structure
value.description: Protein structure information from Protein Data Bank.

source.query: SELECT DISTINCT BE.BioEntityName AS result FROM Protein P INNER JOIN ProteinBioEntity PBO ON PBO.ProteinId = P.ProteinId INNER JOIN BioEntity BE ON BE.BioEntityId = PBO.BioEntityId WHERE BE.DataTypeId = 38 AND P.ProteinId IN (SELECT P.ProteinId FROM Protein P INNER JOIN Identifier I on I.ProteinId = P.ProteinId WHERE P.TaxonomicId = 9606 AND I.DataTypeId = 1 AND I.Alias LIKE '#replaceme#')

value.name: Sequence
value.description: Protein sequence information from Expasy.

source.query: SELECT DISTINCT I.Alias AS result FROM Identifier I WHERE I.DataTypeId = 4 AND I.ProteinId IN (SELECT P.ProteinId FROM Protein P INNER JOIN Identifier I ON I.ProteinId = P.ProteinId WHERE P.TaxonomicId = 9606 AND I.DataTypeId = 1 AND I.Alias LIKE '#replaceme#')

value.name: Domain
value.description: Protein domain information from InterPro.

value.name: Molecular Function
value.description: Information regarding Gene Ontology defined molecular functions.

value.description: Information regarding Gene Ontology defined biological processes.

value.description: Information regarding Gene Ontology defined cellular components.

value.description: Information for association atudies from HGVbaseG2P.
